div.div: She remembers a home that looked fancy on the outside but ominous on the inside, a dark maze of bare chambers. She remembers the parade of men, one after the other, day by day, forcing her to have sex. She remembers contemplating death. She wasn’t yet 10 years old.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V7bWA6&via=Digg&text=An Escape From Sex Slavery

div.a: Journalist Blasts Fox News... On Fox News

div.div: National security journalist Tom Ricks appeared on Fox News to blast the network's incessant coverage of the attack on the U.S. diplomatic compound in Benghazi, Libya.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YjwG8i&via=Digg&text=Journalist Blasts Fox News... On Fox News

div.a: What's It Like To Be A Woman At Goldman Sachs?

div.div: One young woman worked at Goldman Sachs during the go-go 1990s. This is her story.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WROcQI&via=Digg&text=What's It Like To Be A Woman At Goldman Sachs?

div.a: Drone Pilots May Need Distractions To Keep Them From Getting Bored

div.div: Distractions can be lethal while driving, but they may help when flying drones.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UXbiyV&via=Digg&text=Drone Pilots May Need Distractions To Keep Them From Getting Bored

div.a: Making A Flu Vaccine Without The Virus

div.div: A new vaccine strategy could make flu shots cheaper, safer, and easier to produce.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TpHwaf&via=Digg&text=Making A Flu Vaccine Without The Virus

div.a: Why The Global Economy Needs Accurate Data To Grow

div.div: One way to keep America’s global edge is to strengthen the infrastructure surrounding government statistics. Without accurate data, many economic policy decisions are being made in the dark—a crime in the Information Age.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S8m3QT&via=Digg&text=Why The Global Economy Needs Accurate Data To Grow

div.a: Your Tweets Can Get You Sued

div.div: Whether a person makes a defamatory statement on a blog, in a newspaper, or on Twitter or Facebook, he or she can be held legally liable for it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/110z6aV&via=Digg&text=Your Tweets Can Get You Sued

div.a: If We Were As Loyal As Our Dogs

div.div: "It's that man that delivers those papers with the numbers that stress you out! Lemme out I'll bite 'em!"

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ToOoEw&via=Digg&text=If We Were As Loyal As Our Dogs

div.div: THE PEN IS MIGHTIER THAN THE SWORD

div.a: North Korea's Assassination Tools: A Pen And A Flashlight

div.div: All you might feel is someone brush by you and a slight pin prick. But very quickly you would be suffering muscle paralysis followed by suffocation. You would be dead within a very short period of time. This is the deadly effect of just one of the weapons found on a failed North Korean assassin.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10InpX9&via=Digg&text=North Korea's Assassination Tools: A Pen And A Flashlight

div.a: The Highway Patrol Cop Of The Future Is A Robotic Unicycle

div.div: Or maybe an aerial drone. The LA Auto Show's annual Design Challenge suggests the patrol car of the future is optionally manned, self-driving, and armed with autonomous robots.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QlPAYN&via=Digg&text=The Highway Patrol Cop Of The Future Is A Robotic Unicycle

div.a: Inside The Site That Records The Most Grotesque Crimes For The Web

div.div: For nearly 15 years, one website has been serving up the dregs of the miserable and the macabre in easily digestible, pithily headlined format.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V8lB9p&via=Digg&text=Inside The Site That Records The Most Grotesque Crimes For The Web

div.div: WE ALREADY DON'T EVEN REMEMBER THIS STORY

div.a: Did You See That? How Could You Miss It?

div.div: You may have received CPR training some time ago, but would you remember the proper technique in an emergency? Would you know what to do in the event of an earthquake or a fire? A new UCLA psychology study shows that people often do not recall things they have seen — or at least walked by — hundreds of times.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UXzAcg&via=Digg&text=Did You See That? How Could You Miss It?

div.div: The Associated Press has nixed "homophobia," "ethnic cleansing," and a number of other terms from its Style Book in recent months.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uodmny&via=Digg&text=The Associated Press Ditches 'Homophobia,' 'Ethnic Cleansing'

div.div: LUCRATIVE SCAM... UNTIL YOU GO TO JAIL

div.a: How A Rogue Prankster Invented A $400M Google Deal

div.div: For a couple hours, Google's ICOA purchase seemed real. Now the “acquired” company is saying it was a hoax that “originated from Aruba” — but stock charts suggest someone made a killing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XWvfOl&via=Digg&text=How A Rogue Prankster Invented A $400M Google Deal

div.a: Breaking Down Skateboard Tricks Into Data

div.div: With Skataviz, even your wipeouts will look good.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WSTefJ&via=Digg&text=Breaking Down Skateboard Tricks Into Data

div.a: Libyan Milita Threatens To Execute Twelve Men For Allegedly Being Gay

div.div: An extremist Salafist militia in Libya captured twelve men promising to mutilate and kill them for allegedly being gay.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SlkSx2&via=Digg&text=Libyan Milita Threatens To Execute Twelve Men For Allegedly Being Gay

div.a: Cartoon Interpretations Of Fox News' 'War On Men' Article

div.div: Fox News published an article this weekend that laid out the evidence of a war on men. A few illustrators have now responded in comic form.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V2j2jz&via=Digg&text=Cartoon Interpretations Of Fox News' 'War On Men' Article

div.div: Step one: call their cell phone. They'll have no idea what to do.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UVNOKP&via=Digg&text=How To Annoy A Millennial

div.a: The End Of The World Is Nigh—And Here's Who Stands To Profit From It

div.div: Large-scale mayhem has produced some of history’s great fortunes: war, for example, but also the disruptive industrial, digital and—more recently—financial revolutions: A lot of people have become rich, others ruined.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ToJaJ6&via=Digg&text=The End Of The World Is Nigh—And Here's Who Stands To Profit From It

div.div: One of the world's wealthiest men has a tax plan. Shockingly, it doesn't cut his taxes down to nothing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UJntS1&via=Digg&text=Warren Buffett's Tax Plan

div.a: How Amazon Makes Selling 200 Items Per Second On Cyber Monday Possible

div.div: Last year on Cyber Monday, online retailing's answer to Black Friday, Amazon sold more than 200 items per second. It's expecting this holiday season to be its biggest yet.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TpBrKK&via=Digg&text=How Amazon Makes Selling 200 Items Per Second On Cyber Monday Possible

div.div: Here's how to hack your shopping experience at one of the most popular grocery stores in the U.S.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UXxBL3&via=Digg&text=Whole Foods Cracked

div.a: Inside The Largest Single Database On Earth

div.div: Spanner is a creation so large, some have trouble wrapping their heads around it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QkV99V&via=Digg&text=Inside The Largest Single Database On Earth

div.div: SHAME YOUR FRIENDS THAT POSTED THIS

div.a: That Facebook Copyright Notice Is Worthless

div.div: There's a copyright notice people have been posting on Facebook over the past couple of days similar to privacy notice that made the rounds several months ago. Before you copy paste it on your own profile, stop. It's bogus and unenforceable.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V1TDqj&via=Digg&text=That Facebook Copyright Notice Is Worthless

div.a: An NYPD Sketch Artist's Incredibly Bad Serial Killer Sketch

div.div: How will the NYPD handle the fact that it released this sketch (below, right) of a suspect who killed three Brooklyn store owners, only to arrest a man who looked nothing like the Stock Photo: Black Criminal?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UnKQ5n&via=Digg&text=An NYPD Sketch Artist's Incredibly Bad Serial Killer Sketch

div.a: Every Nuclear Explosion Since 1945 In One Time-Lapse Map

div.div: Japanese artist Isao Hashimoto has created a time-lapse map of the 2053 nuclear explosions which have taken place between 1945 and 1998, beginning with the Manhattan Project's "Trinity" test near Los Alamos and concluding with Pakistan's nuclear tests in May of 1998.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UVv12d&via=Digg&text=Every Nuclear Explosion Since 1945 In One Time-Lapse Map

div.div: THIS IS WHAT THEY SHOULD TEACH IN SCHOOLS

div.a: How Does An Etch A Sketch Sketch?

div.div: Twist the familiar, white knobs and an image appears on the screen as if by magic. So what is that magic exactly?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V86T2i&via=Digg&text=How Does An Etch A Sketch Sketch?

div.div: EVEN WORSE THAN PULP IN THE EYE

div.a: Grapefruit Poses Health Risk To Patients, Warn Scientists

div.div: Grapefruit poses a potentially lethal health risk to increasing numbers of patients taking prescription drugs, experts have warned.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10Iey7G&via=Digg&text=Grapefruit Poses Health Risk To Patients, Warn Scientists

div.div: BECAUSE YOU'LL NEED TO MAKE THEM ON YOUR OWN

div.a: A Twinkie Dissected Into Its 37 Ingredients

div.div: As Hostess Brands Inc. deals with the flood of inquiries interested in reviving the Twinkies brand, photographer Dwight Eschliman turned his attention to the ingredients that make up the snack.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ten4oP&via=Digg&text=A Twinkie Dissected Into Its 37 Ingredients

div.div: PSA: THE INTERNET IS NOT REALITY

div.a: Despite Viral Attack Video, British Crime Rates Are Down

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V059Ct&via=Digg&text=Despite Viral Attack Video, British Crime Rates Are Down

div.div: One of the largest toy chains in Sweden published a gender-neutral Christmas catalogue, which pictured boys playing with dolls and girls holding toy machine guns. The move has reignited a debate in Sweden over the proper place of gender roles.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YfgF36&via=Digg&text=Swedish Toymaker Publishes 'Gender-Neutral' Christmas Catalogue
